cab.content: this document is the property of his britannic majesty's government %^MOST SECEET Copy. No.20W.P. (42) 603.December 23, 1942. 1 35TO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY.It is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document.WAR CABINET.MIDDLE EAST TANK STATE AT DECEMBER 9, 1942.Note by the Prime Minister.MY colleagues may be interested to see this Statement. It should be returnedto Sir Edward Bridges.w. s. c.10 Downing Street, S.W. 1. ;[24787] Sherman. Grant and Lee, U.S.A. Stuart, U.S.A. Crusader, British. Total, Cruisers. Infantry Tanks.
